I believe it is important to pay it forward.

lenders.name: kelly
lenders.loan_because: i want to encourage anyone to follow their dreams!  create the life you wish to lead for yourself and your family!
lenders.occupational_info: i have a small retail shop and an online boutique.  i also do consulting and retail planning

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: Even though for America I don't have a lot, as a citizen of the planet I have much more than many.  I know my own struggles to survive and I live in a country of plenty.  I can only imagine the struggles for people in developing countries.  It's important to help others to have a good life and to provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office for a hightech company.  I sit at a desk in front of a computer all day.  I am single so do not have a husband to bring in a second income (2 incomes are needed in America), so I have a little farm where I raise my own meat, eggs, vegetables. I give when I can.

lenders.name: Pooja
lenders.loan_because: I want to give opportunities to those who want to work hard to make their lives and their children's lives better. Even though what I give is a small amount, it can be of high value to the borrower after collecting from many lenders. I live in the US now, but came from a developing country Nepal. I believe that we all can help each other to make lives better. But it cannot be done without hard work and determination.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a PhD student. Majority of the time I do research in molecular biology. I love learning about life from molecular level to cellular level, to organismic level.  I sometimes teach Cell Biology to students.

lenders.name: Walter
lenders.loan_because: of the love of Jesus Christ.

lenders.name: Philippe
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled and met people whose generosity and spirit abounded. I have met people who gave to me when they had so little. And this is a time in my life I can afford to repay some of the debt I owe.

lenders.name: Collin
lenders.loan_because: The world can be better

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to life their dreams!

lenders.name: Nicola and David
lenders.occupation: Stewards of 50 beautiful acres + Touch Wood Rings
lenders.loan_because: KIVA is a real, tangible way to share the blessings of a good life.
lenders.occupational_info: We strive to live sustainably and care for our 48 acres of meadow and forest in the Cariboo-Chilcotin area of British Columbia.    We work online offering custom made and individually handcrafted wooden rings for folks all over the world. (www.touchwoodrings.com) We believe in 'right livelihood'.  We appreciate having this opportunity to support folks by making loans through KIVA, and our support is dedicated to Touch Wood Ring wearers everywhere.

lenders.name: Michael Lopez
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference. Which I hopefully do with Kiva :)

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: it helps people help themselves and it feels good to give!

lenders.name: marianne
lenders.loan_because: I am so fortunate to live in the wonderful country of Canada with a good paying job & a husband with a good paying job & I feel so much for those less fortunate than we are.  I'm very excited to be part of this innovative idea called Kiva.  If this loan achieves what it is supposed to, it will make us so happy to have been of assistance.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a call centre, providing emergency  service to vehicles which have broken down on the roadside.
